## Introduction

As described in the Methods document the posterior distributions are summarised in terms of a point **estimate** (mean), **lower** and **upper** `r opts_jagr("level") * 100`% credibility limits (`r (1 - opts_jagr("level")) / 2 * 100`th and 
`r (1 - (1 - opts_jagr("level")) / 2) * 100` th percentiles), the standard deviation (**SD**), percent relative **error** (half the 95% credibility interval as a percent of the point estimate) and **significance** (Bayesian equivalent of two-sided frequentist p-value).

The posterior distributions for the *fixed* (Kery and Schaub 2011 p. 75) parameters in each model are summarised below.
